original: Berghammer, Emil Teodor, direktör, Norrköping, f. 2/9/83 i Norrköp. G. 10 m. Heldis Göransson. Barn: May Britt f. 13, Inga Britt Margareta 20. — Dir. i östergötl. Dagblads A-B sed. 09. Medl. av Tidn:utgiv:-fören., v. styr :ordf. i dess A-sekt. 28, styr :led. i Sv. publ. pens :’kassa 33, medl. av Publ :kiubben.
translated: Berghammer, Emil Teodor, director, Norrköping, b. September 2, 1883 in Norrköping. Married on October 10 with Heldis Göransson. Children: May Britt b. 1913, Inga Britt Margareta b. 1920. Director at Östergötland's Dagblad AB since 1909. Member of the Newspaper Publishers' Association and chairman of its A-section in 1928, board member of the Swedish public pension fund in 1933, and member of the Public Club.
